fields.name: Effect:
fields.value:
Discard your Hand excluding (Satcheled) cards. You gain a new Hand with an Attack! and a Block!, along with 3 other cards of your choice without duplicates. Max 1 being special, and it cannot be Duel?!

*Can ONLY be obtained through winning a Duel. Cannot be used in the phase it is obtained. Cannot be stolen/discarded.*
